description: TLSServer configures the TLS serving endpoints of a component

crt.description: Crt is a public X509 certificate used by the component to serve TLS endpoints. If specified, the certificate must be signed by the configured CA.

key.description: Key is the key for the configured TLS certificate.

secretRef.description: SecretRef is an optional reference to a secret in the runtime cluster that contains the TLS certificate and key Expects the following optional keys - tls.crt: Crt - tls.key: Key

validity.description: Validity specifies the lifetime of a generated TLS certificate (ignored for existing certificates)
